title: Create a license record
content:
1. From the main menu, select Run > Software Asset > Licenses.

  2. Click New.

  3. In the New License dialog box, input all requested information.
    License detail section

    Field Description
    License class The classification of the license. It is set to Purchased license by default for licenses added from the Software Asset Management module.
    Display label External (common) name of the software.
    License metric Metric of license.
    Note: If you have enabled the new SAM capability, it's advisable that you remove the License metric field by using Studio.
    License model License asset model.
    Publisher Software publisher.
    Owner The person who manages or monitors the software.
    Total rights Total number of rights to install or use the licensed software according to the license.
    Asset tag The asset tag for the license.
    Quantity The number of licenses.
    Unit rights

    The number of authorized rights included in one license.

    For example, an organization might buy 5 licenses (the Quantity) each of which allows 20 authorized users (the Unit Rights).
    Perpetual

    Select if the license is perpetual.

    Note: If you select this option, the Start Date and End Date fields no longer apply.
    Upgrade license Select if the license is an upgrade license.
    Note: Available when the license is a perpetual one.
    Start date Start date for entitlement to use the software.
    Note: Available when the license is a subscription.
    End date End date for entitlement to use the software.
    Note: Available when the license is a subscription.
    License contract The contract for the license.

    Initialization options section

    Field Description
    Select phase The phase that the software license is currently in, including New, Awaiting delivery, Receive, Prepare, Pool, Retire, Ended, and Canceled. 

  4. Click Save.
